resource.description: A pseudo-resource that manages which of your ECS task sets is primary.

properties.name: Cluster
properties.description: The short name or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster that hosts the service to create the task set in.

type.description: The short name or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster that hosts the service to create the task set in.

properties.name: Service
properties.description: The short name or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service to create the task set in.

type.description: The short name or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service to create the task set in.

properties.name: TaskSetId
properties.description: The ID or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the task set.

type.description: The ID or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the task set.
